3100.name: The Northwest End Of The Concourse
3100.description:
This is the concourse, the city wall is just west. A small promenade
goes east, and the bridge is just north of here. The concourse continues
south along the city wall. The sounds of city life echo around.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: You see the Bridge.

east.description: You see the promenade.

south.description: The promenade continues far south.

3101.name: The Promenade
3101.description:
The river gently flows westwards just north of here. The promenade
continues further east and to the west you see the city wall. Park Road
leads south from here. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: The promenade continues.

south.description: Park Road leads south.

west.description: You see the Concourse.

3102.name: The Promenade
3102.description:
The river gently flows westwards just north of here. The promenade
continues both east and west. South of here you see the entrance to the
park, and a small building seems to be just west of the entrance. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

east.description: You see the promenade.

south.description: You see the park entrance.

west.description: You see the promenade.

3103.name: The Promenade
3103.description:
The river gently flows westwards just north of here. The promenade
continues both east and west. A small path leads south. Looking across
the river you see the levee. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. The sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: You see the Concourse.

south.description: The small path leads south.

west.description: You see the promenade.

3104.name: The Northeast End Of The Concourse
3104.description:
This is the Concourse. The city wall is just east and a small promenade
goes west. Looking across the river you see a building that resembles a
warehouse. The Concourse continues south along the city wall. The smell
of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

south.description: The Concourse continues south.

west.description: You see the promenade.

3105.name: The Park Entrance
3105.description:
The area opens just inside the small park of Midgaard. To the north is
the promenade and a small path leads south into the park. to the east is
the famous Park Cafe. The sounds of city life echo around. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: You see the promenade.

east.description: You see Park Cafe.

south.description: You see the park.

3106.name: Park Cafe
3106.description:
This isside Park Cafe, a very cozy place with many tables and seats
where you can relax and enjoy the view. To the east Visible is the
entrance to the park. The air is still and musty. Shadows gather in the
corners.

west.description: You see the park entrance.

3107.name: A Small Path In The Park
3107.description:
A path winds along a small path through the park. The path continues
south and east. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Path In The Park

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Path In The Park

3108.name: A Small Path In The Park
3108.description:
This area is a small path inside the park. The park entrance is just
north of here, and Park Cafe is just east of the entrance. The path
leads further east and west. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: You see the northern park entrance.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Path In The Park

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Path In The Park

3109.name: A Small Path In The Park
3109.description:
The area is a small path running through the park. It continues west and
south and just north of here you see the southern wall of Park Cafe. The
sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Path In The Park

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Path In The Park

3110.name: Cityguard HeadQuarters
3110.description:
The cityguard headquarters buzzes with activity. Stone walls are lined
with weapon racks and duty rosters. Guards in polished armor stand
ready, while others study maps of patrol routes. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: You see Park Road.

3111.name: Park Road
3111.description:
The road continues north and south. A building is just west of here, you
notice a sign on the door. The park entrance is to the east. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

east.description: You see the park entrance.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

west.description: You see the Cityguard HeadQuarters.

3112.name: The Western Park Entrance
3112.description:
The area opens at the western end of the park. A small path leads east
into the park and going west through the entrance you will reach Park
Road. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The sounds of city life
echo around.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Path In The Park

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

3113.name: A Path In The Park
3113.description:
This is the park. The paths lead north and west. Westward is the park
entrance and to the east you see a small pond. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Path In The Park

east.description: You see the pond.

west.description: You see the western park entrance.

3114.name: The Pond
3114.description:
The area is swimming around in the pond, feeling rather stupid. You can
get back on the path from the eastern and western end of the pond.
Ripples spread across the surface. The current tugs gently at your
limbs.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Path In The Park

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Path In The Park

3115.name: A Path In The Park
3115.description:
This is the park. The paths lead north and east. Eastward is the park
entrance and to the west you see a small pond. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Path In The Park

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Eastern Park Entrance

west.description: The water flows toward The Pond

3116.name: The Eastern Park Entrance
3116.description:
The area opens at the eastern end of the park. A small path leads west
into the park. Going east through the entrance you will reach Emerald
Avenue. The sounds of city life echo around. Buildings crowd together on
all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Path In The Park

3117.name: Emerald Avenue
3117.description:
This area is the north end of Emerald Avenue. To the north is the
promenade and to the west is the park entrance. To the east is the not
very big Town Hall of Midgaard. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

east.description: A passage leads to The Waiting Room

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Eastern Park Entrance

3118.name: Park Road
3118.description:
Cobblestones give way to smooth flagstones along this well-maintained
park road. Ancient oak trees provide shade overhead, and the scent of
flowers drifts from nearby gardens. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

3119.name: Emerald Avenue
3119.description:
The area opens at a bend on Emerald Avenue. The road leads north and
west. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings
crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

3120.name: The Road Crossing
3120.description:
This is the middle of the road cross. Roads lead in all directions. A
huge black iron chain as thick as a tree trunk is fastened into the
ground at the center of the road cross. Its other end leads directly
upwards towards the sky. A road sign is here. The sounds of city life
echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

up.description: The chain disappears in the clouds.

South - Emerald Avenue.    West  - Park Road.  Someone has added the following with red paint:     Up    - Redferne's Flying Citadel.

3121.name: Emerald Avenue
3121.description:
The area opens at a bend on Emerald Avenue. The road leads south and
east. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

3122.name: Park Road
3122.description:
The area is Park Road which leads south and north. Elm Street is east of
here. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Elm Street

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

3123.name: Elm Street
3123.description:
The area is Elm street. Park Road is to the west and Elm Street
continues in eastward direction. The sounds of city life echo around.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The End Of Elm Street

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

3124.name: The End Of Elm Street
3124.description:
Elm Street ends here at a weathered stone wall marking the city's
southern boundary. A single lantern flickers at the corner, casting long
shadows across the quiet residential district. The sounds of city life
echo around. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Elm Street

3125.name: Emerald Avenue
3125.description:
The area is Emerald Avenue which continues north. The Concourse is south
of here. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

south.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

3126.name: Park Road
3126.description:
The area is Park Road which continues north. The Concourse is south of
here. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

south.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

3127.name: On The Concourse
3127.description:
This is the southwest corner of the city wall. The Concourse leads both
north and east. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The Northwest End Of The Concourse

east.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

west.description: Through the South Gate you can see a small path leading southwards.

3128.name: On The Concourse
3128.description:
The Concourse continues both east and west. Emerald Avenue is north of
here. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of
city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

east.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

west.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

3129.name: On The Concourse
3129.description:
The Concourse continues both east and west. Park Road is north of here
and an iron grate leads south to the graveyard. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

east.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

south.description: Through the solid iron bars you see the graveyard.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

3130.name: On The Concourse
3130.description:
This is the southeast corner of the city wall. The Concourse leads both
north and west. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The Northeast End Of The Concourse

west.description: The cobblestones lead to On The Concourse

3131.name: Park Road
3131.description:
This is Park Road which continues north and south. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Promenade

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

3132.name: Emerald Avenue
3132.description:
This is Emerald Avenue which continues north and south. Penny Lane leads
east from here. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones
are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Promenade

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Penny Lane

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

3133.name: Emerald Avenue
3133.description:
The area opens at a bend on Emerald Avenue. To the east the road goes on
and to the south is the Road Crossing. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Road Crossing

3134.name: Emerald Avenue
3134.description:
The area opens at a bend on Emerald Avenue. To the west the road goes on
and to the north is the Road Crossing. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Road Crossing

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

3135.name: Park Road
3135.description:
This is a bend on Park Road. To the north the road goes on and to the
east is the Road Crossing. The sounds of city life echo around.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Road Crossing

3136.name: Park Road
3136.description:
This is a bend on Park Road. To the south the road goes on and to the
west is the Road Crossing. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. The sounds of city life echo around.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Park Road

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Road Crossing

3137.name: The Waiting Room
3137.description:
This is the waiting room at the town hall. Wooden chairs stand along the
walls and a long desk with a typewriter is placed in the middle of the
room. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: It looks like some kind of office.

west.description: The exit west leads to Emerald Avenue.

3138.name: The Mayor's Office
3138.description:
This is the not very big office of the Mayor of Midgaard. A large and
polished but completely empty desk is standing in front of an armchair
that looks so comfortable that it most of all resembles a bed with the
head end raised slightly. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

west.description: The waiting room is to the west.

3139.name: Penny Lane
3139.description:
The area is Penny Lane. Emerald Avenue is to the west and Penny Lane
continues in eastward direction. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Penny Lane

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Emerald Avenue

3140.name: Penny Lane
3140.description:
The area is Penny Lane. The narrow road continues north and west.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The End Of Penny Lane

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Penny Lane

3141.name: The End Of Penny Lane
3141.description:
This is the end of Penny Lane. The only exit appears to be south. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life
echo around.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Penny Lane

3150.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
3150.description:
The area is a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees. An iron
grate is to the north. The air is fresh and clean. The open sky
stretches overhead.

north.description: Through the solid iron bars you see the Concourse.

south.description: The gravel road continues southward.

3151.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
3151.description:
The area is a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees. The open
sky stretches overhead. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: The gravel road continues northwards.

south.description: The gravel road continues southward.

3152.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
3152.description:
The area is a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees. The open
sky stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: The gravel road continues northwards.

south.description: The gravel road continues southward.

3153.name: A Gravel Road In The Graveyard
3153.description:
The area is a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard. On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet.

north.description: The gravel road continues northwards.

south.description: The gravel road continues southward to an open space before a small building.

3154.name: In Front Of The Chapel
3154.description:
The area is an open space before a small chapel. A gravel road leads
north through the graveyard and the chapel entrance is to the south. The
air is fresh and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: The gravel road continues northwards.

south.description: The chapel door is made of dark wood.

3155.name: Inside The Chapel
3155.description:
This is a small, dark chapel. The dark brown glass in the tiny windows
do not let much light through. A few rows of worn wooden benches stand
here and an ancient altar sits in the middle of the floor. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: The chapel door is made of dark wood.

3200.name: Under The Bridge
3200.description:
The arch under the bridge is covered by seaweed about a foot above the
surface of the river. The water gently flows through an opening in the
lower part of the city wall. The roar of water fills your ears. The
depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Swift Flowing River

3201.name: On The River
3201.description:
North of here you see the miserable buildings of Poor Alley. The river
flows west towards the bridge. The riverbanks are too steep to climb.
The roar of water fills your ears. The depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

west.description: Deep waters churn near Under The Bridge

3202.name: On The River
3202.description:
North of here you see the dump. The river flows from east to west. The
riverbanks are too steep to climb. Spray mists the air around. The
water churns with dangerous currents.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

3203.name: On The River
3203.description:
The levee is directly north of here. The river flows in an east west
direction. The roar of water fills your ears. Waves crash and foam
relentlessly.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Levee

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

3204.name: On The River
3204.description:
You see the warehouse on the northern riverbank. East of here you see
the city wall. The river flows west towards the levee. Spray mists the
air around. The depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

3205.name: On The River
3205.description:
The river enters from a hole in the eastern city wall. The hole has been
blocked by several vertically positioned iron bars set into the wall.
Spray mists the air around. The water churns with dangerous
currents.

east.description: The iron bars make it difficult to pass through the hole in the wall. Beyond the bars you see that the river leads into a cavern below the mountain range to the east.

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The River

3100.name: maid
3100.long_desc: The Maid is waiting for your order.
3100.description:
She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes.  A good reason
for coming here more often, you think to yourself.

3101.name: sexton
3101.long_desc: A Sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.
3101.description: The Sexton looks like he is relaxing after another gravedigging job.

3102.name: chief
3102.long_desc: The Chief Guard is looking very upset.

3103.name: cityguard
3103.long_desc: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.

3104.name: secretary
3104.long_desc: A secretary is sitting at the desk, typing away on the typewriter.
3104.description:
She looks very busy.

The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Mayor is extremely busy today.'
The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime.'

3105.name: mayor
3105.long_desc: The Mayor is sitting in his huge chair, snoring loudly.
3105.description: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.

3106.name: crier
3106.long_desc: The Town Crier is here, weeping quietly.
3106.description: He is very good at his job - completely dissolved in tears.

3120.name: swan
3120.long_desc: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
3120.description: The white swan is very elegant.

3121.name: duckling
3121.long_desc: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
3121.description: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

3122.name: sparrow
3122.long_desc: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
3122.description: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

3123.name: duck
3123.long_desc: A duck is here, quacking happily.
3123.description: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

3100.name: cup
3100.room_desc: A cup has been set here.

3101.name: cup
3101.room_desc: A cup has been set here.

3102.name: cup
3102.room_desc: A cup has been set here.

3103.name: bottle
3103.room_desc: A bottle of Evian natural spring water is here.

3104.name: canteen
3104.room_desc: A canteen has been set on the ground here.

3105.name: key
3105.room_desc: An iron key has been left here.

3106.name: key
3106.room_desc: A rusty key has been left here.

3107.name: key
3107.room_desc: A wooden key has been left here.

3108.name: key
3108.room_desc: A brass key has been left here.

3109.name: desk
3109.room_desc: A desk is set against the western wall.

3110.name: safe
3110.room_desc: A safe is placed in a dark corner of the room.

3111.name: bench
3111.room_desc: A white-painted wooden bench is standing here.

3112.name: key
3112.room_desc: The very big City Key is lying here.

3113.name: fountain
3113.room_desc: A small white fountain is standing here, gurgling happily.

3114.name: coins
3114.short_desc: a small pile of gold coins
3114.room_desc: A small pile of gold coins lies here.

3115.name: gold
3115.room_desc: A lot of gold is here.

3116.name: candlestick
3116.room_desc: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

3117.name: tree
3117.room_desc: An old elm tree grows here.
